item.description: Update Physical Rescue; INC#0589; 10:25AM; 3174 N Deronda Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xPD0JQ; #HollywoodHills; Firefighters extricated one patient from an overturned vehicle approximately 20 feet down an embankment, which came to rest on or near a multi-story residential structure. Occupants of the structure have been safely evacuated. It is unknown if the structure has been compromised. Firefighter-paramedics transported one elderly female to a local hospital in fair condition. Nothing further. ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E261 E27 E52 E76 E82 EM5 HR3 RA52 RA76 T27 T61 UR88; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#0589; 09:38AM; 3174 N Deronda Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xPD0JQ; Hollywood Hills; One vehicle over the side, approximately 40 feet down. Firefighters are preparing to extricate one patient.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E261 E27 E52 E76 E82 EM5 HR3 RA52 RA76 T27 T61 UR88; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1108; 04:47PM; 7801 N Vicky Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ofh2He; #WestHills; Firefighters arrived to find an auto and attached garage engulfed in flames, spreading to the home by way of the attic. Firefighters quickly deployed hose lines inside the home to prevent further damage. It took 32 firefighters 22 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E104 E105 E106 E293 E305 E73 RA104 T105 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1108; 04:25PM; 7801 N Vicky Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ofh2He; West Hills; *Tentative Address* Fire fully-involving a garage, spreading into the home. Offensive mode.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC1 BC17 E104 E105 E106 E293 E305 T105 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0649; 12:10PM; 12826 W Tonopah St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xLL2DA; #Arleta; It took 29 firefighters 23 minutes to extinguish flames that spread from a garage to a one-story vacant home. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E239 E289 E298 E7 E77 E89 EM12 RA77 RA86 RA89 T39 T89 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 06/21/2022 INC#0126

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0126; 03:01AM; 1667 W Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HF5Jpm; #PicoUnion; *Address Corrected to 1667* Eighty-two LAFD Firefighters took just 32 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within a 100' x 100' one-story commercial building housing "American Textile Maintenance", a textile laundry and rental service. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E203 E210 E211 E215 E226 E229 E26 E3 E46 EM1 EM11 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA13 RA15 RA26 RA3 RA815 RA826 SQ21 T10 T11 T26 T29 T3 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0126; 02:29AM; 1659 W Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3N2W79b; #PicoUnion; PRELIM: 100' x 100' one-story commercial building with fire showing from the roof, threatening one commercial building to the west.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E203 E210 E211 E215 E226 E229 E26 E3 E46 EM1 EM11 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA13 RA15 RA26 RA3 RA815 RA826 SQ21 T10 T11 T26 T29 T3 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Update Contained - #CoyoteFire Brush Fire; INC#1700; 10:51PM; 3650 N Barham Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/39E4aLX; #HollywoodHills; The 100 LAFD Firefighters assigned, assisted by precise helicopter water drops, have stopped forward progress of the fire in just 75 minutes, holding the fire to the preliminary estimate of one (1) acre of medium-to-heavy brush. Those LAFD ground crews will continue to work with LACoFD Hand Crews into the early morning hours with hand tools to achieve further control of the fire's perimeter in rugged terrain. Helicopters are soon to be released from the incident. No injuries have been reported. No structures damaged. No formal evacuation. This fire was entirely within the City of Los Angeles, and did NOT threaten the AVA Apartments, Universal City / Universal Studios, the distant Hollywood sign on Mt. Lee, Forest Lawn Cemetery or the neighboring City of Burbank. An updated acreage figure may be available in daylight tomorrow. The fire's cause remains under investigation.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 BC18 BC5 CM42 E1 E227 E260 E27 E278 E290 E3 E39 E41 E52 E76 E82 E86 E90 EM14 H3 H5 H6 HA3 HA5 RA60 RA76 RA90 T27 T60 T78 T90 + LACoFD; CH5; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update #CoyoteFire Brush Fire; INC#1700; 10:00PM; 3650 N Barham Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/39E4aLX; #HollywoodHills; This active wildfire, known as the "Coyote Fire", has 72 LAFD personnel, including those aboard three LAFD helicopters assigned and battling at least one acre of medium-to-heavy brush burning above the dog park near the Ava Apartment complex, the fire is moving toward Coyote Canyon. The Los Angeles County Fire Department is joining the battle in Automatic Aid, with the deployment of as many as 5 Camp Crews and 1 Helicopter. No imminent structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC18 BC5 E227 E260 E27 E278 E290 E52 E76 E82 E86 E90 EM14 H3 H5 H6 HA3 HA5 RA76 RA90 T27 T60 T78 T90 + LACoFD Camp Crews and Helicopter; CH5; 13; Brian Humphrey
